description: A Set of Stata Commands for Confirmatory Tetrad Analysis | This respository contains three Stata commands for conducting Confirmatory Tetrad Analysis (CTA). In addition, the repository is set up so that the commands can be installed within Stata. Simply type "net install tetrad, from(https://github.com/sbauldry/tetrad/raw/master) replace" without the quotes in Stata's command window. These commands are introduced in Bauldry and Bollen (2016)
name: Tetrad
